entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 10:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
